attributes.action: Stop lorries over taking on duel carriage ways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lorries should be keep in left hand lane on duel carriage ways ,and not be allowed to over take another lorry.Car etc, should be made to drive at lease 60 mph in the left hand lane on duel carriage way ,this would stop tail gating and also keep the traffic flowing better.
